snippet: The company warned, though, that challenges remained as its latest wide-body plane makes its way through final development and testing.
abstract: Airbus reports first-quarter net profit nearly doubled to 439 million euros, or $602 million, from 227 million euros year earlier; better-than-expected profit is helped by lower production costs of its A380 superjumbo jet and favorable exchange rates.
lead_paragraph: The company warned, though, that challenges remained as its latest wide-body plane makes its way through final development and testing.

headline.print_headline: Airbus Exceeds Expectations With First-Quarter Profit
